Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) self:hidden(1) oat_RPC:set('state', 'Results')
oat_RPC:set('title', GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong():GetDisplayMainTitle()) oat_RPC:set('author', GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong():GetDisplayArtist()) oat_RPC:set('pack', GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong():GetGroupName()) oat_RPC:set('score', math.ceil(STATSMAN:GetCurStageStats():GetPlayerStageStats(0):GetPercentDancePoints() * 10000) / 100)
oat_RPC:update() end
